additionalResources.description: list of additional resources to create (processed via `tpl` function), useful for create ClickHouse clusters together with clickhouse-operator. check `kubectl explain chi` for details

affinity.description: affinity for scheduler pod assignment, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.affinity` for details

commonAnnotations.description: set of annotations that will be applied to all the resources for the operator

commonLabels.description: set of labels that will be applied to all the resources for the operator

additionalLabels.description: labels to add to a secret with dashboards

annotations.description: annotations to add to a secret with dashboards

enabled.description: provision grafana dashboards as configMaps (can be synced by grafana dashboards sidecar https://github.com/grafana/helm-charts/blob/grafana-8.3.4/charts/grafana/values.yaml#L778 )

imagePullSecrets.description: image pull secret for private images in clickhouse-operator pod possible value format `[{"name":"your-secret-name"}]`, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.imagePullSecrets` for details

env.description: additional environment variables for the deployment of metrics-exporter containers possible format value `[{"name": "SAMPLE", "value": "text"}]`

tag.description: image tag (chart's appVersion value will be used if not set)

nodeSelector.description: node for scheduler pod assignment, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.nodeSelector` for details

env.description: additional environment variables for the clickhouse-operator container in deployment possible format value `[{"name": "SAMPLE", "value": "text"}]`

tag.description: image tag (chart's appVersion value will be used if not set)

priorityClassName.description: priority class name for the clickhouse-operator deployment, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.priorityClassName` for details

resources.description: custom resource configuration, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.containers.resources` for details

podAnnotations.description: annotations to add to the clickhouse-operator pod, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.annotations` for details

podLabels.description: labels to add to the clickhouse-operator pod

create.description: specifies whether rbac resources should be created

namespaceScoped.description: specifies whether to create roles and rolebindings at the cluster level or namespace level

create.description: create a secret with operator credentials

annotations.description: annotations to add to the service account

create.description: specifies whether a service account should be created

name.description: the name of the service account to use; if not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template

enabled.description: ServiceMonitor Custom resource is created for a [prometheus-operator](https://github.com/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator) In serviceMonitor will be created two endpoints ch-metrics on port 8888 and op-metrics # 9999. Ypu can specify interval, scrapeTimeout, relabelings, metricRelabelings for each endpoint below

tolerations.description: tolerations for scheduler pod assignment, check `kubectl explain pod.spec.tolerations` for details
